verses.name: Judges 1:23
verses.text: And the house of Joseph sent to descry Beth–el. (Now the name of the city before was Luz.)

verses.name: Judges 1:24
verses.text: And the spies saw a man come forth out of the city, and they said unto him, Shew us, we pray thee, the entrance into the city, and we will shew thee mercy.

verses.name: Judges 1:25
verses.text: And when he shewed them the entrance into the city, they smote the city with the edge of the sword; but they let go the man and all his family.
